column48: ["I love Ted talks BUT this app is killing my experience. It won't even let me watch a video, it Takes a long time to even start to search. I am constantly restarting the app so that I can even click the search button. I finally got it to click a video and it freezes on the play video screen and im unable to actually play the video. I will be switching back to the website until the app is fixed.", "It wasn't the best app before, just a general app experience with quality content. Now, I can't even start a video, the entire thing just freezes. At one point, to see if it was just the page or a loading issue, I flipped through all the bottom options, account, listen, search, home, only to have it lock and only allow me to scroll the loaded videos. Not play them, just look. I have a healthy S20 5g, no issues with the phone or service, just a junker of an app.", "The talks are good but the app itself is slow and a bit buggy the player opens when I change the volume or it doesn't open at all I tap on the screen and nothing happens it doesn't close the app when I'm tapping the back button it really sucks. If you don't mind the bugs this app is good for watching these talks offline but the podcasts are best on Google podcasts.", "This is not the Ted I used to know. What is with a 20-minute ads that are hard to skip? If you tried to listen to a playlist, it inserts ads that are 20 minutes long and then you have to click a button to skip. So unattended listening is dead. Sometimes it just skips the next video and starts at 20 minute add again. I don't mind short ads give it up to a minute and a half long. Thats fine. But 20 minutes long???", "I really want to love this app but the download feature is AWFUL. It constantly fails to download playlists and will try for hours. And then, if you try to cancel it downloading a playlist because it is stuck it will undownload the WHOLE playlist. On top of that, even once you manage to get something downloaded, unless you're connected to WiFi or data it frequently won't play it. And sometimes even when you're connected it still won't play it and will freeze and spin forever even if you kill the app. Andddd furthermore, I couldn't find the setting that only allows it to stream over wifi. There's one for downloading only over wifi. But I've accidentally streamed over my data plan multiple times now. Which I wish I had more control over. Overall, the only reason I didn't give this app 1 star is because the content is worthwhile and the interface would be great if I could get the downloading to work smoothly. As it is, I feel like it's trash.", "When full-screen, the pause button doesn't show up. It forces you to hit your own phone's back button if you want to pause, meanwhile the video is still playing as it minimizes the whole video. You have to press on the play bar to get the video up again, and only then the pause button is available. Aside from that, other streaming services allows you to customize subtitle size, but you can't on here, which is too big for the videos. I do appreciate the double language subtitles feature though.", "The content and personalization features are great but any interaction with a video that is in progress causes the app to crash. if you try to rewind, change to portarit mode, skip ahead...video will stop playing. If it only occurred a few times there'd be no problem. But it happens every time. So if you're halfway through a video and it crashes you can restart it, but you cant skip ahead to the spot you were on last. Honestly I use the app to find great recommendations then find them on youtube", 'This app is very buggy. If you do anything besides watch the selected video straight through (e.g. 15s rewind, change the playback speed, rotate the screen back to portrait mode, etc) you run a high risk of it completely crashing on you and having to wait to get the error message pop up asking if you want to force close it.', "Ads are agressive and evil. I tried several times to watch one video kept having to see the same ad over and over and over. It wouldn't play the video at all. When I was able to watch another and immediate aggressive ad came on as soon as the talk finished. I understand needing to generate revenue but like many other apps using the app itself has become a very draining and negative experience due to aggressive ads", "The app has a glitch; when the next video plays, an add pops up, then it skips the video again and we have to re watch the add and it keeps replaying and skipping the next video. You have to get out of watching the next one and pick a different video, but sometimes the videos don't play and it gets stuck in thst cycle again... Just FYI if the developers didn't know. ...", "The podcasts are my favorite. WorkLife and Sincerely X are masterpieces that I am grateful to have had access to, and I sincerely wish there were more episodes to listen to! The only hitch is that sometimes the very end of the recordings are cut off :( it's just the final few seconds, but it leaves me curious! And I will continue to listen.", "Love the ability to watch TED talks on the go but the UI/UX for a tech inspired ap is startingly terrible. It tends to freeze, no visual to indicate prior views, the auto play doesn't play the next video on the playlist, no ability to form your own playlists, no recommended videos and none of the surprise me options available on the Roku ap- it needs a major update in my opinion", 'Seriously needs an update. I download videos via wifi for offline viewing and then when i go to watch them they need to use data to play. Also the "clear downloads" option is not working, my downloads are still there. Overall it\'s just glitchy. I love the talks and the options the app has but it just doesn\'t work quite right.', 'Love TED talks but the app is very beta on the tab S7+. Player; once in, does not let you switch app and come back and watch. Audio keeps running but video will not restore. Video controls are gone as soon as the video starts and wont come back, wont let you fast forward or rewind etc. I use the website now due to this app being so unusable and so beta feeling with these kind of amature bugs.', "There are tons of very useful and inspiring Ted talks. And that is a great job done by speakers. But Ted apps developers' job is awful and disgusting. It takes only few seconds or taps to make the app not responding on Poco X3 Pro. And it doesn't matter whether the cache is emptied or not. The app just can't be used in its current state. Hope to see future updates very soon that will fix the app, otherwise I'll have to delete and forget about it, which I don't want at all.", "The new version is terrible! I used to watch video a lot, but after updating . . . There's problems with loading and downloading videos and also you need to turn on the subtitle and set the language for every videos while you have set it in Setting Option. AND turning on the subtitle is not possible without maximizing screen!!!!", 'I love TED videos, indeed. I loved the option that videos could be slow down, to understand a quick speed talker. I loved the feature that I could download ONLY the audio part. When two people talk to each other, there is no reason to watch them. But all these positiv elements are GONE. What has left, is a very slow, clumsy app - which I have just deleted!', "I used to watch videos a lot on TED, but after I updated(I don't know which version was, but that version with white and red icon was perfect) I see so many bugs. Speed of loading is so down, appearance and new upgrades aren't satisfying at all. It's really hard to work with this new version. Besides all of those, so many videos aren't loading and become so annoying. This app is really helpful n I love it but this version is disappointing.", "The updated app is literally useless. When scrolling/ sliding the videos they fly past too quickly. Then when you click on a video it doesn't do anything. Clicking on the bottom navigation links don't work either. It's been like this a long time I can't believe it hasn't been fixed by now.", "Still same. Sad to say but beyond logo and quantum physics logo it proceeds to nowhere. Even if you somehow login after hours, it still showing logo and it's animation for all the time. I had some links saved of Ted talks vids and selected them to open up in this app but unfortunately, it doesnt. Subs are missing or diesnt load. Data saving, skim silence & playback speed for podcasts is missing. What a 🗑️ update. Disappointing update. Uninstalling. Will limit my usage for TED to desktop only.", "Finally after many months it runs on Android devices. I could listen to all main video speech in audio mode but in this version it isn't possible to choose video or audio and if I want to just listen, the app force me to listen to some podcast like ted radio hour or other related podcasts.They are not main speech and it is too bad. please solve this too.", "The TED app is literally unusable on dual-screen phobes like the Surface Duo 2. The screen is cut off and all the text is huge. It's like is squeezing the Android tablet version onto a phone screen. It's useless. Please fix.", "Very clunky! App constantly does NOT respond to expanding the screen, clicking to go back, clicking on saved lists etc... Definitely expected more; I don't know...like, for the app to actually function correctly! And yes, I restarted my device and reinstalled the app, multiple times to no avail!", "It's a buggy app for my device. I can't use it with ease 😭, always delayed responses especially when clicking the navigation bar icons that's placed at the bottom. The overall interactions is delay.", 'No Chromecast support, and just keeps playing in the background with no notification when the app is closed. This app used to be much better than this.', 'I needed this App to make my small world more interesting and knowledgeable. I am a war time American disabled veterans who like others find their lives are more demanding And ❓ confused.Alot more being at the wrong place and demanding and choosing the correct outcome to a situation. We now have to think before we open the doors of life. Thank you program Ted!!!', "Hi. Earlier Ted App was awesome. But from few months it can't even open. When I open Ted App, it shows opening screen as TED in red words. After that there is one preloading gif with like proton, neutron and electron moving. And the same gif carries for more than 10 minutes. But still app doesn't even load or proceed. I don't know whether I am getting videos or not.", "Very disappointed you removed the Cast feature from this app. Please bring it back. I bought a Chromecast partially because I wanted to cast TED talks to my TV, now I realize I wasted my money because you randomly removed it, even though its been a feature for years. Took me all day to even find anything online that mentioned the change. Almost everything said to just click the cast icon in the corner and it'll work.", "I commented earlier today about the app not loading. I tried again, waited more, used a vpn, changed some settings hoping it will make it work and it works! I'm not sure what was the reason but I think I should have waited more the first time. Thank you _____ I disabled battery saver, gave the app all the permissions and cleared the cache. Not sure if these are the reasons it started working. I also waited two to three minutes for it to load.", 'New version is slow and works very poorly or not at all, takes forever to load, and I preferred the chronological display of new talks as with the old version of the app. "Submit" button for feedback in the app doesn\'t work.', 'The app freezes after watching 1 video everytime. I have to close it and restart again to use it. Other than that, I am not able to search or access any other section of the application. Kindly fix this issue', "Used to have the TED app a while back, really enjoyed it back then. Recent version(s) don't seem to have Chromecast support anymore (why?!?), Rendering it useless for my use case - uninstalling from my device TED devs - please lmk when you re-add Chromecast, I'll be happy to reinstall and review accordingly.", "It's a brilliant, informative app but I'm unable to change playback speed after the recent update. Please get that back. And also, enable subtitles when full screen is not on. These would make the app flawless!", 'Nice app and a special hats off to the feedback team for Playstore Ted talks app. Because whenever I contact a customer service or something like that team, they usually reply me with an already created template which is also used for others. But here u guys are giving different replies for different users. Great job.', "The latest update has made the UI look much better but it has a lot of bugs. 1. The option to change playback speed is no longer there. Please bring it back. 2. To access subtitles, I have to go to the fullscreen mode necessarily. It doesn't show on the normal screen. 3. The Ted-Ed videos keep pausing on their own. Not a buffering problem, but they pause and the user has to manually press play. Highly inconvenient.", 'I used this app daily and I have been enjoying thoroughly. Unfortunately, the last big update brought up a couple changes that made my user experience worse. In particular, you can no longer change the speed of the video, and that was a really useful feature for me. I hope it comes back in a future update. UPDATE: it\'s impossible to remove talks from "My List". I removed a few, both watched and unwatched, but when I opened the app again they were there again. Tried a few times, same result.', "I could get over the re-design of the app (although in my opinion, it's very much taken a turn for the worse) however, I cannot find Chromecast support anywhere in the app. Searching the internet for answers and there appears to be no solution other than referencing former versions of the app which had it. Casting the screen and then playing the video works, but it comes through at fairly low resolution and a bit jerky. A real shame.", 'The TED is one of the best platform to learn interesting stuffs. I always enjoy watching things which normal people do not do. But to watch these videos we need speed. Please give the feature for increasing the video speed. It is really necessary. Also the videos watched on the websites and on the android app are not synchronising. I hope you will consider the same.', 'Still great content, but the recent app overhaul is extremely disappointing. So far, it seems to have lost functionality. The list of new talks is a small fraction of what there was on the old home screen. The control to change the playback speed seems to be missing. I usually watch at a higher speed. The new app looks nice though.', "The new version is a massive step backwards. Scrolling through My List is almost impossible. Videos I've removed from the list appear back again next time I open the app. The ability to change the playback speed has been removed. As has the ability to cast to another device. Looks good though 😔"]

column3:
Kutuki is India's favourite learning app Preschool Learning games, kids videos & stories, rhymes & songs.
  • 🇮🇳 Winner of Aatmanirbhar App Innovation Challenge, Featured on Mann ki Baat
  • Learn English, Hindi, Kannada, Tamil, Telugu, Marathi & Malayalam
  • Every on in the family can learn something new in just 10 mins everyday.
  • Smart & Safe Screen time - No Ads, Parent Corner & Screen Limit Timer Kutuki kids learning app is Made by Educators for Indian kids in LKG, UKG, Playgroup and Nursery. Kutuki has taken deep care to ensure that preschool kids stay curious with joyful learning. With Kutuki Kids Learning App, kids learn and develop skills in English, language, STEM, social and life skills all while playing games, watching videos & singing rhymes. Research shows that preschool kids learn best with the help of Games, Stories and Rhymes. Especially when the settings and characters are familiar to the kids. Kutuki’s Games, Stories & Rhymes are Made in India, set in India and filled with Indian Culture and Values. Kutuki Kids Learning App enables kids to learn in English as well as several Indian languages. Kutuki's Learning App is aligned to preschool curriculum and will ensure that kids learn important topics such as - ⭐ Learning to Read, Write & Speak English Letter & Alphabet sounds through Phonics ⭐ Learning English Alphabet Tracing/ Handwriting ⭐ Counting numbers ⭐ Learning and recognizing Shapes ⭐ Learning and recognizing Colours ⭐ Building general knowledge and awareness ⭐ Develop good & healthy habits Through Kutuki’s creative curriculum - games, rhymes, stories, activities, kids have fun learning preschool themes ✓ Indian Festivals & Culture - Diwali, Dussehra, Holi, Ugadi, Christmas ✓ Space (Planets, Earth, Moon, Stars, Astronauts) ✓ Health and Hygiene (Yoga for kids, Exercise for kids, Food, Healthy Eating, Vegetables, Fruits) ✓ Animals and Nature (Dogs, Cats, Pet Animals, Farm Animals, Wild Animals, Plants, Flowers, Trees, Dinosaurs) ✓ Travel and Transport ✓ Emotions & Feelings, Sharing, Overcoming Fear, Overcoming Shyness Language should not be a barrier, so apart from English, our creative curriculum can also be accessed in Indian languages. Here is why so many Indian parents trust Kutuki Kids Learning App for their kids - ✓ Kids Learning App that's Made by Educators ✓ Made in India app. Made for Indian kids ✓ Safe, Age Appropriate, Ad Free app experience ✓ Fresh, Original, learning focused rhymes and stories ✓ Loveable Characters (Kutu, Ki and Minku) that help kids to learn important life and moral lessons - positive behaviour, patience, humility, determination and kindness ✓ The app is simple to use for kids. It’s less of an app and more of a learning tool ✓ English that is simple ✓ English that is in Indian accents so that children can easily understand ✓ Approved by Montessori and Kindergarten teachers. Curriculum based themes, designed by educators for kids' unique and growing educational needs ✓ Kids build strong foundations in English (Phonics stories, activities, tracing games and more) ✓ Kids develop number sense with number stories and activities ✓ Interactive format - quizzes and games along with rhymes and stories keep kids engaged and learning while having fun You can also watch Kutuki videos on YouTube Kids/YT Kids Follow us on Instagram Send us an Email
column4:
Kutuki is India's favourite learning app

Preschool Learning games, kids videos & stories, rhymes & songs.


  • 🇮🇳 Winner of Aatmanirbhar App Innovation Challenge, Featured on Mann ki Baat
  • Learn English, Hindi, Kannada, Tamil, Telugu, Marathi & Malayalam
  • Every on in the family can learn something new in just 10 mins everyday.
  • Smart & Safe Screen time - No Ads, Parent Corner & Screen Limit Timer


    Kutuki kids learning app is Made by Educators for Indian kids in LKG, UKG, Playgroup and Nursery. Kutuki has taken deep care to ensure that preschool kids stay curious with joyful learning.

    With Kutuki Kids Learning App, kids learn and develop skills in English, language, STEM, social and life skills all while playing games, watching videos & singing rhymes.


    Research shows that preschool kids learn best with the help of Games, Stories and Rhymes. Especially when the settings and characters are familiar to the kids. Kutuki’s Games, Stories & Rhymes are Made in India, set in India and filled with Indian Culture and
    Values. Kutuki Kids Learning App enables kids to learn in English as well as several Indian languages.

    Kutuki's Learning App is aligned to preschool curriculum and will ensure that kids learn important topics such as -


    ⭐ Learning to Read, Write & Speak English Letter & Alphabet sounds through Phonics

    ⭐ Learning English Alphabet Tracing/ Handwriting

    ⭐ Counting numbers

    ⭐ Learning and recognizing Shapes

    ⭐ Learning and recognizing Colours

    ⭐ Building general knowledge and awareness

    ⭐ Develop good & healthy habits


    Through Kutuki’s creative curriculum - games, rhymes, stories, activities, kids have fun learning preschool themes


    ✓ Indian Festivals & Culture - Diwali, Dussehra, Holi, Ugadi, Christmas

    ✓ Space (Planets, Earth, Moon, Stars, Astronauts)

    ✓ Health and Hygiene (Yoga for kids, Exercise for kids, Food, Healthy Eating, Vegetables, Fruits)

    ✓ Animals and Nature (Dogs, Cats, Pet Animals, Farm Animals, Wild Animals, Plants, Flowers, Trees, Dinosaurs)

    ✓ Travel and Transport

    ✓ Emotions & Feelings, Sharing, Overcoming Fear, Overcoming Shyness


    Language should not be a barrier, so apart from English, our creative curriculum can also be accessed in Indian languages. Here is why so many Indian parents trust Kutuki Kids Learning App for their kids -



    ✓ Kids Learning App that's Made by Educators

    ✓ Made in India app. Made for Indian kids

    ✓ Safe, Age Appropriate, Ad Free app experience

    ✓ Fresh, Original, learning focused rhymes and stories

    ✓ Loveable Characters (Kutu, Ki and Minku) that help kids to learn important life and moral lessons - positive behaviour, patience, humility, determination and kindness

    ✓ The app is simple to use for kids. It’s less of an app and more of a learning tool

    ✓ English that is simple

    ✓ English that is in Indian accents so that children can easily understand

    ✓ Approved by Montessori and Kindergarten teachers. Curriculum based themes, designed by educators for kids' unique and growing educational needs

    ✓ Kids build strong foundations in English (Phonics stories, activities, tracing games and more)

    ✓ Kids develop number sense with number stories and activities

    ✓ Interactive format - quizzes and games along with rhymes and stories keep kids engaged and learning while having fun



    You can also watch Kutuki videos on YouTube Kids/YT Kids

    Follow us on Instagram

    Send us an Email

column48: ["Very nice. My kid is enjoying using this app. The songs are so good. He likes the snake and ladder. I was thinking to play with him but he wasn't paying attention to the game but after watching it, he is now asking me to play with him. He also says call me 'kutu'. I am so happy seeing him getting stars for all the questions. Make learning fun time!", 'It is very difficult to find an Indian content online, kutuki app simply nails it. I personally love the theme when dad cooks and gets overboard about jimjimajim masala. My 4 year old adores the app. She sings the songs and recites the stories all the time !', "It's a good app for children..It includes number of sections..The variety of learning things,we do not able to discuss with our child are covered here. It is helpful to improve vocabulary also.", 'Good app..but its quite tough for pre school kids to grasp such heavy english songs...it would have been better if there were basic things rather than so many fast sung poems....some folders are good some are i think what should not be included in it..its a 50-50 app...my kid enjoys some of the selected songs anyway', 'Fantastic learning app. Very much relevant content. It is little different in teaching compare to other apps my son really enjoys. Only flaw in the app is we cannot forward or rewind the videos, not sure if they have some reason behind disabling those features for kids.', 'Most amazing app for kids... I can give this app without second thought to my kid... In fact I love some of the songs alot. They are teching such great content in simplest, most memorable way. Kudos team Kutuki.', 'Kutuki kids app is enjoyable. Kutuki is just like YouTube. Because kutuki app need mobile data like YouTube and this app will be ok. I give ⭐⭐⭐ because I am 13 years old and I think kutuki is not best.I give first ⭐here because 10 years above people have small of fun. There is mathematics and this symbol (*) equals to multiplication symbol . I give remaining 2 ⭐⭐ here because in this app we have stories, rhymes and so on to children.', "Very well planned and excellent for kids.i absolutely admire it very beneficial to my kids they are five and are very excited to learn and watch write on this e- learning app .as a parent I think this is a good time giving app for children as I can make them see this and can do my other works with out any hindrance as it doesn't bore them and exite them to watch and speak and repeat and answer and even write and the best part is they are able to improve their communication skills.u get a star ⭐", 'Earlier - Your app is not working in realme tablet which was launched recently. Do something about it. Now you guys have worked hard and kept me posted as t each stage. Now it is working great. Thank you', "The app is ok. I would like this app to have a learning environment for Bengali as my Little brother can't understand English and also can't understand Hindi. There should also be a videos group for Bengali like Hindi, Marathi etc. This is a good app for little children to have a headstart in learning and I am inspired by this.", 'I was initially using free membership and when I showed this to my son who is 4 years old, he satrted loving it and I have upgraded to paid membership 1 month back. Now loves all the characters Kutu, Ki and Minku especially and mimic them. All the videos are pleasing to eyes and ears and heart. My boy is really enjoying this and learning from it, what else I need. Thank you Kutuki team.', "Very nice app and good for learning I liked this app very much just I found 1 problem that we can't learn any languages. Otherwise the app is superb and amazing. We can learn very useful things from this app. Thanking you", 'Very very good. But some of the stories and songs that happens some difficult to understand for nursary children. Any how it is very useful app for ages. Its only my opinion. Totally it is good.', 'Nice app for kids.... Kids understand the concepts very well with the help of visual presentation.', 'This is a wonderful app for kids. My four year old twins just love it. I have downloaded lots of apps for them, but they keep coming back to Kutuki. There is so much wonderful content for free. My kids seem to love it, so I have just purchased the 1 year subscription which is well worth the money. Thankyou for this great app and good job. From South Africa.', "My son is enjoying with this app. It's very useful for nonverbal also. He enjoys the ADL activity rhymes and try to sing along with it ,this is the first time he is doing like this 👍.", 'This is a good app though i am not through this fully but songs stories are qre quite good and innovative....very primitive some times but serves the purpose keep up good work..', 'Love this app and kids really enjoy the poems. Maybe sometime the rhymes can go slow as catching words or phrases is little difficult for kids. You can add speed options like .75x, 1x, 2x. Also enable streaming to big screens via chrome cast or other options. Overall amazing made in India app. Awesome work 👏', 'My kid loves the rhymes in n this app and also the best way to teach them about our country and its various cultures.. great job team Kutuki 😁', 'very nice... specially the kutku is very innocent in looks and actions as well as in voice... i love kuttu... material is also easy and nice... soothing and catchy music...', "It's a lovely app... For my sister but only one problem is that the language video is not what I expected but OK..", 'This app is really good to understand phonics and alphabets. Star rating in between increase concentration and encourage kids to learn more.', "Omggggg, I love this app, and I totally recommend it, there are soo many different things to learn and it's so fun to learn, children are so attracted to it because of the stars they give and cheer up children by saying let's watch the video and the earn a star come on, children find it so fun to play . I like the app because it also gives a lot of difference, I install this app for my baby brother and it is so good it improved my brother a lot.. Thank You so much Kutuki...😊😊😊👌👌", 'It is the best app that I have come across.My son loves it and is really keen to learn from this app.The best part is that it is child friendly and has a lot of interactive activities for children. I truly recommend it to everyone.', "This app is an absolute love!!! I always craved for something new, fun, educative and original for kids. Something Indian. God bless people who founded Kutuki. So happy and so proud to use it. It has almost every thing like notes of melody, vowels etc. Absolutely beautiful Indian app. As posting on 21st Jan, 2022 after 4 months of usage:: 1) The sliding bars in the videos have been removed. So, everytime you have to watch the entire video to come to a particular point. It's a drag.", 'Must use app for all kids, instead of showing useless cartoons to kids, please use this app to grow your kid with good knowledge and our values information.... Good job kutuki team', 'I think this app is fantastic.It engages my son is attending well provides a visual to go along.Listen to understand your video, audience new knowledge.Often that visual helps him get started writing,reading, he respond good practice skills,rhymes,ultimate phonics,kutuki adventures,exercise, activities,animals,interative, Gk, habits, colours,sooonnnnn.Good effectively,videos animation, music, screen capture everything is superbbb.Great experience & feeling so good he much interested in learning.', 'I love this app because it has my favourite animal elephant and there can also be a frog and all other animals and when things are locked then we unlock and it it is fun and we both the children play that game a lot to have fun.', 'Wow. Wow. Wow. Wonderful app. I am so amazed that this app has so many features for free. Only some are premium and need to be unnlocked. Keep up the good work.', 'Fantastic app which makes learning a truly fun experience for kids. Help spread the word. Share it among family, friends and on #sm platforms. 💯😍', 'Really very nice app. Thanks for developing such a very beautiful and useful app for the children. 😊', 'Very excellent 👌👏app just liked it it has fun interesting learning videos and I loved that craft activities that are in that videos....', 'The OTP has 6 digit to enter but the OTP sent to the mobile number consiste of 5 numbers only!!(w.r.t smart tv)', 'This app is really..amazing, my daughter learned very much from this..keep going kuttuki..u r ammazing Thanking u.. 🥰🥰🎈🎂', 'Ultimate and best ever app for children..they enjoy learning is the key with this app', 'This aap was osm for kids learning but it does not have option to learn english so that is the problem', "I am 12 years old and i installed this for my brother but I like this app and kutus voice that's why more than my brother i use this 😜😜 This is really very fun", 'Excellent app for kids .. Awesome content .. Very usefull .. Should give 10/Stars but it has ony 5', 'This app is very good excellent 👍👍👍👍 my son is watching and waiting reading very fast', 'Very nice app acilent thank you kutuki for making this app its amazing kutuki nice and very much nice . 😀😀']

column3:
Long Description:
Education Network (https://edunetworkbd.com/), the most trusted online educational platform  as well as offline-support platform of Bangladesh, is introducing the first ever all-in-one learning app for Bangladeshi students, covering everything starting from JSC to JOB Preparation with chapter-wise videos, quizzes, PDF Books and further learning materials. Now, it is easier than ever to prepare for any exam, using our ever increasing video bank tutorials. All the courses are available in two categories: either completely free of cost or paid, from anywhere in the world. Paid courses are the premium contents with Full HD Video with all other free features.

Current Features:
✔ With ever increasing videos under every courses on weekly basis.
✔ All of our content is organized chapter-wise according to the NCTB curriculum, Admission Syllabus and JOB Syllabus accordingly.
✔ Free contents are available in this app for a trial before purchasing a course.
✔ Courses on Graphic Design, Microsoft Word, PowerPoint, Excel and additional skill development and professional courses are going to be added soon.
✔ Chapter-wise PDF Books covering all topics are adding weekly.
✔ Option to take quizzes, written exams and get real-time feedback
✔ A performance monitor and track one’s progress

I belive that it will become a best learning app in Bangladesh very soon..❤❤', "Fantastic App for us...Thanks to the 'Network' teams for creating such a beautiful app...", "This app is such a amazing app. Specially what I was looking around the University questions practice without answer. And finally I've found it here. Great app🖤", 'One of the best educational app! Keep it up brothers!!', 'This system is very good and helpful. Only advertising books.', 'It’s very helpful for admission students', 'Excellent app for students', 'Very helpful app for admission Students', "I didn’t use this app .i seem to that It's can be better App", 'i tried to register but when i submit, it says to regiater again.. what is the meaning of this?', 'Giving this review even without using this app. Because I believe Network.<3', 'Super good,kintu science Group change er bisoy gulo rakhle valo hoto,jmn gk,english,bangla,iq', 'Nice and helpful app', 'Very nice app...', 'Jogonno..xm i dewa jy na...barbar attention lika ase...oi 15 number er cheap prosnr xm dia lob to hboi na..ulta eder lob hbo..kli nijeder dalali..thirdclass sosta faltu appp', 'Kon baler developer diya develop korcoc madarchod...Kiccu kora jay na loading bug sob ace ...baler app develop koira dice khankir celera', 'App tah ossadaron..donnobade asspect series keh..etoh sundor app bananor jonno..🖤..', 'Xm deoa jay na.kn...', 'Onek valo akta apps..', 'ভাল উদ্যোগ অবশ্যই। অ্যাপ্স টার ডেভেলপমেন্ট দরকার। অ্যাপ্সে ঢোকাই যায় না মাঝে মাঝে, নো কানেকশন দেখায়। ৬০ এর মধ্যে কেউ কেউ ৬৭.৫ পায়, আবার কেউ ১৬৭ পেয়ে বসে থাকে! column3:
The #1 math app for early learners — from counting to multiplication.

■ More than 10 million parents and 5,000 teachers have made Todo Math their go-to app for young learners
› COMPREHENSIVE: 2,000+ interactive math activities for Pre-K through 2nd grade.
› LOVED BY KIDS: math practice kids ask to play. Engaging gameplay, beautiful graphics, and adorable collectibles.
› EDUCATIONAL: Common Core State Standards-aligned curriculum. 5,000+ elementary classrooms have used Todo Math.
› INCLUSIVE & ACCESSIBLE: playable in 8 languages, left-handed mode, help button, dyslexic font and other accessibility features empower ALL children to learn independently.

Try Todo Math for free today!
› Easy email signup.
› No commitment, no credit card information collected.

■ Todo Math covers all the fundamentals of early math education
› Counting and Number Concepts - learn to write and count numbers.
› Calculation - practice addition, subtraction, multiplication, and word problems.
› Mathematical Logic - number-based memory games and pictographs.
› Geometry - Learn basic geometry, such as drawing and learning shapes.
› Clocks & Calendars – learn days of the week, months of the year, and how to tell time.

■ Todo Math lets you select the right challenge level for your child
› Level A - Count to 10 and identify the names of shapes.
› Level B - Count to 20, and add and subtract within 5.
› Level C - Count to 100, add and subtract within 10, tell time to the hour.
› Level D - Place value and simple geometry.
› Level E - Carry-over addition, subtraction with borrowing, and dividing a plane figure equally.
› Level F - Three-digit addition and subtraction, measurements with ruler, and graph data.
› Level G - Comparing three-digit numbers, addition and subtraction of two-digit numbers, foundation of multiplication.
› Not sure of which level is right for your child? No problem! Use the in-app placement test.

■ Parents Page
› Easily change your child’s level, edit their learning profile, and review their learning progress.
› Sync profiles across multiple devices, including cross-platform.

■ Built by Experts
› Leading education experts from Harvard, Stanford, UC Berkeley, and Seoul National University.
› Award-winning children mobile app designers.
› Team was named co-winner of the Global Learning XPRIZE competition, a worldwide competition to have children teach themselves math and literacy skills.

■ Awards & Recognitions
› SIIA CODiE award finalist (2016).
› Winner of the Parents’ Choice Award — Mobile App category (2015, 2018).
› Awarded Best Design at the LAUNCH Education & Kids Conference (2013).
› 5 out of 5 star rating from Common Sense Media.

■ Safety and Privacy
› Todo Math complies with the US Children's Online Privacy Policy, does not contain any third party advertising, and can be played without an internet connection.

■ Have questions?
› Please check the FAQ on our website's help section (https://todoschool.com/math/help).
› You can get the fastest response by going to the website > Help > Contact Us or the in the Todo Math app > Parents Page > Help.
∙ ∙ ∙ 
We empower ALL children to learn independently.

column48: ["We love this app for the functionality. However you guys are really falling short on support. We paid for a annual subscription two weeks ago, and emailed as well, but still haven't received any app activation. Edit: Update - after I posted here, I've got a lightening fast response and resolution for my issue. Amazing!!", "My son is ahead of his class because of TODO MATH. This is the BEST MATH APP on the app store. I tried a few apps and observed which one he used the most. This was the best decision I made to help my son learn math up to Grade 1, especially during the lockdown. He's only 5 but doing math at 7 year old level. For the best results, parents should definitely help their children through the difficult exercises, to encourage excitement about learning long term. Thank you enuma.", 'Debated whether to pay the one/two year fee as it seemed to be incredibily expensive, but bit the bullet. There seems to be a lack of decent maths apps for kids, and this is good. However £80 pounds for a 2 year subscription seems extortionate, having now seen what is on offer. Maybe a lifetime subscription at this price, might be more pallatable, or some ongoing discount for regular subscribers. The daily challenge is good, but the reward at the end could be a bit more interesting/entertaining.', "By far the best math app I've seen. Very popular with the kids too. A real win-win situation. Hint: For weak readers, I recommend the highest kindergarten level instead of the 1st grade level. 1st grade level requires reading some instructions and it simply became too frustrating. There are some voice recorded instructions in the first grade level, but not enough for dyslexic kids. Also, the color palette and decor for 1st grade somehow dissappointed my kid. It felt more melancholy somehow. I would LOVE to see material that introduces 100 vs 10 vs 1 and how you line them up when adding vertically and why you do so (don't know what that is called). There are some levels (in the free practise section) that address the subject but they all assume previous teaching and they don't do that introduction per se. Would that be possible?", "Would Give 5 stars IF you add 3rd grade math becuase it says for 4-12 and I'm 8 and I'm in 3rd grade and there's no third grade math update: now I'm 9 and I'd really like the game if you let me play more than 6 lessons for a free trial in one day. thanks for responding to me", "Fab but price is off-putting. This app is perfect for my children and they actually enjoy learning maths now but unfortunately for the yearly subscription it is just too expensive when I'm unsure how long they will maintain interest. If there was a monthly subscription available it would be worth paying once the trial period ends and much more feasible for those on low income.", "Absolutely love this app!...amazed at how engaged my daughter is...she honestly thinks shes on some treasure hunt as she goes through the activities. Really excited to see how much my daughters math skills will grow. Shes 4 now and as much as I've tried the idea of simple addition/subtraction just couldnt stick but shes got no problem figuring it out with this app. On top of all of that I had a few issues setting it up on my device but their customer service is excellent. Highly Recommend!", 'I am so happy to find the option in french!! Thank u so much', "My 5 yr old (who usually hates educational apps) enjoyed playing on this app for awhile, so I thought I'd look into unlocking the rest of the content. I was shocked at the price! As a low-income family we simply can not afford a yearly subscription at that level, not to mention who knows how long my daughter would continue playing it, and most of the sub time would probably be wasted. If it offered a monthly sub, maybe $5 to $7, I would have done it. It's really a shame that the developers created such a price barrier to learning.", 'My 6 year old found it fun. It progressively gets more challenging. I wish the instructions were read out loud. The content is good. I wish there was a monthly subscription. $80 for 2 years for an APP is expensive.', 'Great app. Just needs some small fixes. -When my boy writes a 9 it thinks its a 4 sometimes. And when he writes 4 it thinks its 21. - The games where you drag numbers or pictures to a location auto snaps it into place if its correct. So my boy has learned to just drag the number around until it auto snaps in, instead of solving the problem.', 'Great when it works, but in some games like Patterns it just freezes in the middle of the game. Minimizing the app I can still hear the background music. Using on a Galaxy Tab A 10.1', 'This is an incredibly useful app for teaching children the relationships between different elements of mathematics. The relationship between counting and shapes, and a general appreciation for symmetry is developed. I have used this app with my son for more than an year now and he enjoys it very much. Thank you Enuma! A note for Indian users: payment for subscription via UPI is buggy inspite of the app not having automated renewal. Payment via NetBanking is a more dependable route.', "My daughter loves this app. She didn't like studying math. So everyday it was like a war to do it. But after changing a method to learn from just a paper and a pancil to this app, she can't wait the time to stdudy math. It's incredible to me! Thank you for making this app.", "My 3 year old loves it and actually learns now. She knows how to write numbers now. Totally worth the subscription, i love how i can look at my child's progression as well. I recommend to all parents.", 'My kids love this app! They are learning so much while they think its a game! Its very easy on the eyes since its very colorful! Highly recommend!', 'keeps crashing on my chrome book have sent many feedbacks and no response.was able to use the free version now paid and it wont work deleted everything power washed my computer yet sill not working i want my money back as i cant use it on my chromebook.', "I have to delete it because it won't even open. I refuse to give it access to all my files and it won't open. There is no reasonable excuse for these apps to have access to all your personal media.", 'Great foundation building for toddlers and preschoolers! However i cannot seem to subscribe, it takes me to the homepage instead. Is there a bug?', 'Good app, but not available on Amazon Fire tablets. The kids can only play on my phone, not their own devices. Make app available on this format and it would be 5 stars', 'Kind of easy but I think it teaches 2nd and 3rd graders basic multiplication which is great.', 'Content is pretty good so far, but the app seems eye watering-ly expensive. Think there are much cheaper decent alternatives', 'u have to pay and can not be under 13', "I LOVE IT! For my disability it helps a lot. Just if there's more games this this from this maker.", "Only 1 year and 2 year subscription model and a pretty steep price. But it's best in class.", 'First this app is superb.and it helps me to do multiples and divisions.so I think this app is more better than hit the button maths Because that one is 11dhirhams and todo math is free.', 'Deceptive! It Downloads a lot of data after the install and the so called "free" version only lasts for 24h.', 'Its good we used it for some math experiment thing lol but those people who had phones were able to play using share it but mine was lowbat =( so I had to do a pen and paper but I screamed yes! Cuz the first 4 letters of my Japanese crush tame is Todo from Boku no Hero Academia or My Hero Academia', 'They said for kid ages 9 to 12 but its like 4 to 6 becuse thise are too easy like there giving you 1 + 1 like how can that be for 9 to 12 but for littler kids but it will teach litter kids good though', 'Plus please can you add a 3 and 4 grade and also installing it quicker please', "We homeschool and this is all the math curriculum we need through 2nd grade. It's a wonderful app!", 'Great games for kids but it keeps crashing after about 15 minutes of play.', 'Was a great free app til they recently updated it, requiring a paid account. No thanks.', 'whenever you try to write your anser with your mouse on your laptop like me like example 9+5 when i tryed to draw the anser it keeped on saying 124 when the anser was 14', 'You can learn in this app is the best but my child is year3 3 it only go up to year2 but is still the best game I have found', 'i was not able to open the app it bas a virus in it as per tha app and to many ads but nice try', 'Great way for my children to keep learning and engaged in this new normal.', 'Application crash when I click on add. Can not proceed further.', 'I love this app. Wish there other subjects we would purchase with the same level response as this app.', "Understand my daughter loves this app to practice her math. But when I installed on my kid's phone cannot see app icon. How can I allow my kids to use it?"]

column2: Cuemath: Math Games, Online Classes & Learning App
column3: Cuemath app is a free learning app for kids of Kindergarten to class 10. It offers brain training, live online classes with coding & math tutors, math games and other tools for kids to build problem solving skills and elevate their IQ. We are building the world’s foremost educational app for kids. More than 400,000 kids around the world use the Cuemath learning app every month to master their math and coding skills. We deliver on our core promise - 10 minutes of daily brain training on Cuemath learning app will make you an Olympian problem solver. Math Gym Train your brain with Math Gym - Math Gym is our learning app’s free brain training tool with 50+ math games, brain games, math puzzles and math riddles to help kids improve their memory, focus, speed, IQ, calculation and accuracy. - It covers all aspects of brain training through simple math games on arithmetic (addition, subtraction, multiplication and division) and advanced brain games on reasoning, aptitude, geometry, algebra, coding, data-ai, etc. - The brain games and math games are adaptive. The difficulty level changes based on questions attempted after assessing a kid’s areas of strengths and weaknesses. And we provide in-depth analytics to track progress. - The brain games and math games are designed to make learning interactive and fun for kids. Kids get rewarded with Cuecoins after each attempt and Math Stones after each level up. - 10 minutes of playing Math Gym everyday can elevate kids’ IQ and cognitive skills. Live Online Classes with Coding & Math Tutors Book a free math & coding online class - You can now book and manage Cuemath’s flagship live online classes for kids with coding and math tutors through the learning app. However, the classes take place on a laptop/PC. - The online classes are live and not recorded. They are delivered by expert coding & math tutors who make learning interactive and help with doubt solving. - You get a comprehensive look at the profile of the expert coding & math tutor assigned to you while you book a free live online class through the Cuemath app. - The live online classes have a blend of worksheets (with autocorrect feature), math games and other interactive tools for effective learning. The syllabus is in sync with CBSE, ICSE, IB and other boards along with NCERT solutions. - We also provide in-depth analytics to track progress of both classwork and homework. - The online courses are designed by experts from IIT and Cambridge. They are available for kids of Kindergarten, class 1, class 2, class 3, class 4, class 5, class 6, class 7, class 8, class 9 and class 10. Multiplication Games Learn tables with Multiplication Games - It is important for kids to understand that multiplication is successive addition and therefore we offer free multiplication games for kids in our learning app. - Learn any multiplication table and test your multiplication skills by playing multiplication games in different orders like forward, reverse or dodge. - Learning the ability to multiply two numbers within seconds will elevate kids’ calculation speed. About Cuemath - Cuemath’s courses and curriculum are designed by math and coding experts from the best universities across the world. - Cuemath is backed by Sequoia Capital and Capital G (Google), the world’s leading venture capital firms. - Cuemath was awarded India’s No. 1 math learning program by EdTechReview. - Cuemath kids stay ahead of their class by 2 years in school and competitive exams. - 3 out of 4 Cuemath kids bagged the top ranks in the International Math Olympiad (IMO). Our support is also just a tap away! If you come across any issues while using the app, report the same by tapping on ‘Need Help?’ in the ‘Profile’ section of the Cuemath app. For more information, visit https://www.cuemath.com/ or write to us at cuemath.app@cuemath.com
column4:
Cuemath app is a free learning app for kids of Kindergarten to class 10. It offers brain training, live online classes with coding & math tutors, math games and other tools for kids to build problem solving skills and elevate their IQ.

We are building the world’s foremost educational app for kids. More than 400,000 kids around the world use the Cuemath learning app every month to master their math and coding skills. We deliver on our core promise - 10 minutes of daily brain training on Cuemath learning app will make you an Olympian problem solver.

Math Gym
Train your brain with Math Gym

- Math Gym is our learning app’s free brain training tool with 50+ math games, brain games, math puzzles and math riddles to help kids improve their memory, focus, speed, IQ, calculation and accuracy.
- It covers all aspects of brain training through simple math games on arithmetic (addition, subtraction, multiplication and division) and advanced brain games on reasoning, aptitude, geometry, algebra, coding, data-ai, etc.
- The brain games and math games are adaptive. The difficulty level changes based on questions attempted after assessing a kid’s areas of strengths and weaknesses. And we provide in-depth analytics to track progress.
- The brain games and math games are designed to make learning interactive and fun for kids. Kids get rewarded with Cuecoins after each attempt and Math Stones after each level up.
- 10 minutes of playing Math Gym everyday can elevate kids’ IQ and cognitive skills.

Live Online Classes with Coding & Math Tutors
Book a free math & coding online class

- You can now book and manage Cuemath’s flagship live online classes for kids with coding and math tutors through the learning app. However, the classes take place on a laptop/PC.
- The online classes are live and not recorded. They are delivered by expert coding & math tutors who make learning interactive and help with doubt solving.
- You get a comprehensive look at the profile of the expert coding & math tutor assigned to you while you book a free live online class through the Cuemath app.
- The live online classes have a blend of worksheets (with autocorrect feature), math games and other interactive tools for effective learning. The syllabus is in sync with CBSE, ICSE, IB and other boards along with NCERT solutions.
- We also provide in-depth analytics to track progress of both classwork and homework.
- The online courses are designed by experts from IIT and Cambridge. They are available for kids of Kindergarten, class 1, class 2, class 3, class 4, class 5, class 6, class 7, class 8, class 9 and class 10.

Multiplication Games
Learn tables with Multiplication Games

- It is important for kids to understand that multiplication is successive addition and therefore we offer free multiplication games for kids in our learning app.
- Learn any multiplication table and test your multiplication skills by playing multiplication games in different orders like forward, reverse or dodge.
- Learning the ability to multiply two numbers within seconds will elevate kids’ calculation speed.

About Cuemath

- Cuemath’s courses and curriculum are designed by math and coding experts from the best universities across the world.
- Cuemath is backed by Sequoia Capital and Capital G (Google), the world’s leading venture capital firms.
- Cuemath was awarded India’s No. 1 math learning program by EdTechReview.
- Cuemath kids stay ahead of their class by 2 years in school and competitive exams.
- 3 out of 4 Cuemath kids bagged the top ranks in the International Math Olympiad (IMO).

Our support is also just a tap away! If you come across any issues while using the app, report the same by tapping on ‘Need Help?’ in the ‘Profile’ section of the Cuemath app.

For more information, visit https://www.cuemath.com/ or write to us at cuemath.app@cuemath.com

column48: ['Tbh there should be solutions/what you did wrong so as to make the user understand his/her mistake. Besides that, it is a great app and I definitely get boosting and refreshing exercises through it <:)', "I have booked a free class. The app doesn't even notified me. And after 10 mins when I have gone to check the class. There is no class showing in the app. NO FREE CLASS", "loved the game it's very nice a very good designed app for maths lovers if there is anyone who is preparing for any exams then this is the best app to get relax from your studies and not to waste time while relaxing", "Recently i've been playing this app and i really like this like it gives me fast and quick education in mathgym and the worksheet too and the maths is being a piece of cake for me!🤩 but in this app it has a bank of coins that i earn by doing gyms and worksheet but by earning and storing coins i can't buy anything from this coins why is that?😕", 'The update which I did yesterday night was horrible. The version before that was a very good one. Please make the old version back. I am also not able to change the grade. Please make it like whenever the app starts it is going at learn insted of play where we have to play the math gym not the place where some ad is there.', 'Unsolicited calls? 📞 Never selected to book a class. I had disconcerting unexpected mobile call today asking if I wanted to book a maths session "for my child".
